name: 'CD' Projekt Rekt
description:
Projekt Rekt

A game made in 72 hours for LD44

Theme: Life is Currency

Play as the lone survivor in a post-apocalyptic world filled with zombies. The objective of the game is to survive the onslaught of enemies in the 'Challenge' game mode. Currency earned in game can be used to purchase upgrades and new characters from the in-game shop. At the end of every wave of enemies, your currency will be increased by the amount of health points you have left.

In order to earn currency easily, the arcade mode (accessed via the 'Play' button in the game) is an infinite, randomly generated game mode with increasing difficulty. This game mode also feature health packs that randomly drop. 

But remember, every bullet fired decreases your health. Make every shot count.

(If you're not here from the LD page, please consider rating this game on the Ludum Dare website:  LD44 - Projekt Rekt)
